data.name: CONFLICT OF NATIONS: WORLD WAR 3 Platoon Pack
data.detailed_description:
This starter pack sets you up for success on the modern battlefield, and contains premium items worth an equivalent of 25 USD. Use Gold to instantly accelerate your weapons research and unit mobilization. Benefit from the multiple gameplay enhancing features of the Security Council.

64.000 Gold Premium Currency (worth 20 USD)

1 Month Security Council Membership Benefits (worth 5 USD)
  • Mobilization and Construction Queuing
  • Enhanced Artillery Fire-Control System
  • Player Alliance (Clan) Creation
  • Unit Rally Point Setting
  • Multiplayer Shared Intelligence
  • Custom CON-News Picture Placement
  • Dedicated In-Game Security Council Chat
  • More Simultaneously Active Matches

* Note: Each DLC pack may only be purchased and activated once per Conflict of Nations: World War 3 account. Previous ownership of items contained in the DLC package does not constitute a valid reason for refund or compensation, so please check them carefully prior to purchase. Any monetary value, quotation or price provided in the details is non-binding and for visualization purposes only.

data.short_description: This starter pack sets you up for success on the modern battlefield, and contains premium items worth an equivalent of 25 USD. Use Gold to instantly accelerate your weapons research and unit mobilization. Benefit from the multiple gameplay enhancing features of the Security Council.
data.supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Polish, Russian, Turkish
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP SP2, Windows Vista or Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo 1.6 GHz or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics integrated chipset
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: For laptops with hybrid graphics chipsets: Please ensure the correct video card is assigned for smooth game performance.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 64-bit: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2.2 GHz or comparable AMD
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce 700 Series or equivalent
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card
  • Additional Notes: For laptops with hybrid graphics chipsets: Please ensure the correct video card is assigned for smooth game performance.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OS X 10.9 or higher
  • Processor: Intel Core Duo 1.8 GHz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics integrated onboard chipset
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Apple Mac onboard sound
